seven.progpracticum

Class PaintStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • seven.progpracticum.PaintStore

  • public final class PaintStore
extends java.lang.Object
    The PaintStore class holds doodle's path, stroke width and stroke color everytime a line is drawn.
    Version:
    Autumn 2013
    Author:
    Aaron Schraufnagel
    Class Invariant:
    myStroke == 1, 3, or 5

      The line doodle's color is returned.

      The line doodle's path is returned.
      java.awt.BasicStroke getMyStroke()
